html: It’s amazing how many NBA teams panic and make all their roster moves in July/August. Like Atlanta — they had OKC over a barrel w/ Melo, nobody else could have absorbed that money. Why not wait, you only get more leverage as season starts and OKC is freaking about their tax bill.
text: It’s amazing how many NBA teams panic and make all their roster moves in July/August. Like Atlanta — they had OKC over a barrel w/ Melo, nobody else could have absorbed that money. Why not wait, you only get more leverage as season starts and OKC is freaking about their tax bill.

html: Houston did it again - Anderson’s contract was untradeable and they somehow flipped it into Knight’s contract which is absolutely tradeable. Now they can trade Knight + a 1st + $$$ and get an expensive wing who’s actually decent-to-good. Bazemore at worst. GSW should be pissed.
text: Houston did it again - Anderson’s contract was untradeable and they somehow flipped it into Knight’s contract which is absolutely tradeable. Now they can trade Knight + a 1st + $$$ and get an expensive wing who’s actually decent-to-good. Bazemore at worst. GSW should be pissed.
